title: Calculate Day of the Week
description:
DAY_OF_WEEK week from the date of receipt
IDATE.
Monday = 1 .. Sunday = 7 The calculation is done in accordance with
ISO8601.
name: DAY_OF_WEEK

input.name: IDATE
input.description: The input date for which the day of the week is to be calculated.

output.name: DAY_OF_WEEK
output.description: An integer representing the day of the week, where 1 corresponds to Sunday.

return_value.description: The day of the week as an integer.
